data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of phytoseiid mites (Acari: Mesostigmata) from southern Tunisia, with discussion of its phylogenetic position

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kreiter, Serge, Tixier, Marie-Stéphane (2006): A new genus and species of phytoseiid mites (Acari: Mesostigmata) from southern Tunisia, with discussion of its phylogenetic position. Zootaxa 1237: 1-18, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.172799
